meanings.sent1: The reprinter made copies of the book for everyone to read.
meanings.sent2: The reprinter at the library was busy duplicating old newspapers.
meanings.sent3: The reprinter accidentally printed the same page twice, creating a funny mix-up.
meanings.sent4: She was a reprinter of memories, bringing old stories back to life through her work.
meanings.sent5: The diligent reprinter ensured that every page was perfectly replicated.

meanings.sent1: Please reprinter this document for our records.
meanings.sent2: The company decided to reprinter the brochures with updated information.
meanings.sent3: He had to reprinter the poster after realizing a typo in the original print.
meanings.sent4: The artist chose to reprinter the painting to enhance its colors.
meanings.sent5: She had to reprinter the invitation after smudging the first print.
